Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/1/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (FBA) on 2/3/1987 to a 5-year deal worth $621,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Troy on 6/13/1988...
